attributes.action: Make available to the NHS in England & Wales drugs that are available in Scotland ie: Aricept, Reminyl, Exelon, Macugen, Alimta, Tarceva, Erbitux
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make available to the NHS in England & Wales drugs that are available in Scotland ie: Aricept, Reminyl, Exelon, Macugen, Alimta, Tarceva, Erbitux."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14746.asp

Prime Minister's Office
